item.title: Report X-2024040004
item.description:
Report X-2024040004

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-03T15:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-30
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 560
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The tank car was reported leaking by UPRR yard personnel. Haz Mat Mgr. Tom Robinson was called for a response. Mgr. Robinson climbed the car and found the packing retainer nut on the liquid valve handle was leaking. He tightened the nut and the car stopped leaking. The spillage evaporated quickly, and no further remediation was needed.
